warezcdn.name: Boku No Kanojo Ga Majimesugiru Sho-bitch Na Ken
warezcdn.title: Boku no Kanojo ga Majimesugiru Sho-bitch na Ken

imdb.title: Boku no Kanojo ga Majimesugiru Sho-bitch na Ken
imdb.plot: Haruka Shinozaki has been interested in the class representative, Akiho Kousaka, since his first year in high school. She is attractive, good at sports, and is an all-around model student.

episodes.title: Ya, Sonna ni Hirogenaide Kudasai...
episodes.plot: Haruka Shinozaki confesses his love for Akiho Kousaka. She accepts and makes up her mind to learn how to be a good girlfriend.

episodes.title: Episode #1.2
episodes.plot: Akiho and Kanata vie for Haruka's attention. There is a campus wide cleaning day at the school.

episodes.title: N ~tsu, nihon douji wa hajimete... desu
episodes.plot: Haruka visits Akiho's house and meets her very strange mother. Akiho studies for her first date with Haruka.

episodes.title: Ko, kon'nafuuni naru ndesu no ne...
episodes.plot: Rin transfers to Haruka's school. She wants to learn how to have a relationship with a man from Haruka and Akino. They also visit a zoo.

episodes.title: Yaburete tatte... -doushi-you!?
episodes.plot: Rin gets a cell phone and learns how to take selfies. Akiho goes overboard trying to sense Haruka's needs and feelings. Akiho attends a class representative meeting.

episodes.title: Ho, hokanohito ni wa misenaide ne?
episodes.plot: The school puts their wishes on a Tanabata tree. There is a school softball tournament.

episodes.title: Mou... nani mo kangae rarenai...
episodes.plot: Haruka and Akiho find a lost dog in the park. They attend a school camping trip.

episodes.title: So, soko made shite ii nante ittenai ~tsu!
episodes.plot: Saori misunderstands the situation when she sees Haruka eating lunch with Kanata. Haruka, Akiho and Rina get locked in the gym equipment storage room.

episodes.title: Ikinari wa dame tte itta no ni ~i~i!!
episodes.plot: Akiho has to cancel her date with Haruka due to family issues. Akiho cooks up an interesting dish.

episodes.title: Mou, gaman deki, masen ~tsu!
episodes.plot: It's final exam time. Everyone attends a school wide sketching event.
